title: Pixel 3 screen keeps flashing suddenly when charging.
content: My screen started to flash suddenly when charging. However, it didn't stop flashing after i removed cable or re-start or went back to factory settings. It really annoying. I found some similar problem here in forum, but i can't find the solution. Please let me know what to do? Many thanks. The pixel 3 is quite new, may be just 2 months.
